name: Lambent Witchfyre
description: The Lambent Witchfyre is a large aberration characterized by its fire-based abilities, glowing with a flame-like appearance. It has no discernible social traits, possessing low intelligence and charisma.
memorable: Its ability to heal from fire damage and turn slain opponents to ash makes the Lambent Witchfyre a nightmarish foe.
goals: Typically seeks to eliminate its opponents with fiery attacks and absorb fire damage to sustain itself.
relations: May be encountered alongside other fire-based entities or creatures that thrive in chaotic environments.
environment: Commonly found in areas infused with fire magic or within burned ruins.
strengths: Immunities to fire and poison, ability to heal through fire damage, and ability to inflict additional fire damage that can spread burns.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and poor social capabilities; limited movement speed.
attacks: Uses Blazing Touch attacks that deal significant fire damage and can set targets ablaze.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Absorption allows it to regain health when hit by fire damage.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to sense its environment without relying on sight.
additional_information: Can squeeze through tight spaces without hindrance.
Inflicts ongoing fire damage to creatures that come into contact with it.
Creates bright light within a 30-foot radius, illuminating dark areas.
test_queries: creature that turns enemies to ash
large creature that inflicts fire damage
creature immune to fire and poisonous attacks
